org.primaresearch.web.gwt.client.page

Class PageLayoutC

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.web.gwt.client.page.PageLayoutC

  • public class PageLayoutC
extends java.lang.Object
    Lightweight page layout class for use on client side (browser; 'C' for client).
    Author:
    clc

      • getPreviousObject

        public ContentObjectC getPreviousObject(ContentObjectC object)
        Returns the page content object that is the immediate predecessor of the given object in the internal list. If the given object is at the beginning of the list the last object is returned as predecessor.
        Returns:
        The predecessor or null

      • getNextObject

        public ContentObjectC getNextObject(ContentObjectC object)
        Returns the page content object that is the immediate successor of the given object in the internal list. If the given object is at the end of the list the first object is returned as successor.
        Returns:
        The successor or null
